mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_ ( userId, email, password, username, address, phone) VALUES (#{userId}, #{email}, #{password}, #{username}, #{address, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_ SET EMAIL = '알수없음@deleted.user', PASSWORD = '알수없음', USERNAME = '알수없음', ADDRESS = null, PHONE = null WHERE USERID = #{userId}
